title: Welcome
content:
Welcome to the Awaiting Christ Return App!

Your trusted companion in growing your faith, understanding Bible prophecy, and staying prepared for Christ’s soon return.

🌟 Inside the App, You’ll Discover:

  • 📖 Daily devotionals and a verse of the day to encourage and ground you in Scripture.
  • 🔥 Prophetic news and articles, updated weekly with fresh, timely insight.
  • 🎧 Featured sermons and teachings from faithful voices committed to sound doctrine and end-times truth.
  • 📚 A complete Bible reader, including both the Old and New Testaments.
  • 🤝 Ways to support the mission, as we reach the world with the Gospel.
  • 📅 Offline access to devotionals and locally saved articles — read anytime, anywhere.
  • 🔗 Links to social media and reliable resources for deeper spiritual growth.

💖 Our Mission

To proclaim the soon return of Jesus Christ, uphold the truth of God's Word, and equip believers to live with hope, holiness, and readiness in these final days. Through sound teaching, prophetic insight, and daily encouragement, we aim to keep your heart fixed on the Blessed Hope — the glorious appearing of our Lord and Savior.

As the world grows darker, let this app be your light — a daily reminder that our redemption draws near. Stay watchful, stay prayerful, and stay ready.

Welcome to the family. Maranatha! ✝️
